other_tests.findings: The liver demonstrates normal echotexture without focal lesions. There is no evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The CBD is of normal caliber measuring 4 mm. The gallbladder is incompletely distended. There is no gallbladder wall edema or pericholecystic fluid collection to suggest acute inflammation. There are no gallstones. Pancreas is unremarkable, its distal body and tail obscured by overlying bowel gas. There is no ascites. The intra-abdominal aorta and IVC are normal in caliber.
